subject: stop looking for a new part-time job - here it is [Fri, 13 Apr 2007 14:45:17 -0800]
body: "I put down traps.      czar  aboveground   He had a rumbling Midwestern voice, roughened by cigarettes.Following the amputation of his thumb there had been a dim period when Paul's greatest single accomplishment, other than working on the novel, had been to keep track of the days.      "But would you want to stay?    and might not an old, tired marl have made a mistake?  WHY?  Not a big one.      "When asked about leads, O'Whunn said, "The police have several, and they are following them up hard and fast, I can tell you. "That had to be David, his voice low and whispery, both humble and a little startled.       archbishop
